page.title: 18STRACHAN PARENTS' WORRIES
page.content:
{SAFETY }Parents are worried about the school playground.The tarmacked ground in front of the school is small and sloping.Accidents occur easily. There is a grassy area around the canteen ideal for swings,climbing apparatus and sand pit.However,the lower part is bounded by a low wall dropping about 2 to 3 metres to the lane behind the school. They worry also about the traffic using this lane.Supervision is difficult with only 2 teachers. {HEATING /HEALTH }The old boiler is dusty and inefficient.During cold weather temperatures of 45F.OFTEN occur.The dust aggravates coughs and allergic tendencies.
Representations to Grampian Region have been made. Lack of money hinders immediate reparation.
